description: The dom-module is one of the two surrounding html tags. You need a template as well.
In the template, we'll add an image of a rock. You can assume it's located at "assets/images/rock.png".
So add a
followUpMessage: So you added html to your web component. Yet if you'd use it, it still wouldn't work. Why is that?

exercises.template:
<link rel="import" href="lib/polymer/polymer-element.html">

<dom-module id="rock">
</dom-module>

<script>
    class Rock extends Polymer.Element {

        static get is() {
            return 'rock';
        }
    }
</script>
minifiedJavaScriptSolutions: class Rock extends Polymer.Element{static get is(){return'rock'}}
